titles.title: POWER Act
Public Oversight of Wholesale Electric Rates Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose a windfall profit tax on wholesale electric energy sold in the Western System Coordinating Council.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/6/2001--Introduced. Public Oversight of Wholesale Electric Rates Act or POWER Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose an excise tax on the windfall profit from the sale of electricity at wholesale in the Western System Coordinating Council. Sets the tax at 100 percent of the windfall profit.
